roleset.name: use the WhatsApp to message
roleset.note: Added by Katie based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to text.01.

example.name: args0 and 2
example.text: PRO wake up and watsapp me

example.name: All args
example.text: The wine spoke to me so and I watsapped him about it?..that I was by no means inviting myself to his b-day, I was just wondering when it was.
example.arg: that I was by no means inviting myself to his b-day, I was just wondering when it was
